column4: have an issue with free space, my i have a 3.1tb partition mounted as /home. i copied 1.1tb to a single folder, and now its saying im using 100% of the 3,1tb
try baobab (Disk Usage Analyzer in the menu) to determine what is using the space
may I ask what this 1.1 TB file is?
lsof | grep deleted   turn up anything?
